profile_positions.description:
Our vision is to create a safe and more productive environment for material handling and crane industry all around the globe. At this role I cooperate with global sales team in various locations in India, Dubai, US and Taiwan. Working closely with global sales team in partnership with local distributors and customer key stakeholders until all strategic objectives are met. Provision of internal and external support for team members is the key success factor to achieve organization sales targets.

Working closely with the global sales team, manage and coordinate the implementation and on-going operation, across international accounts to ensure delivery of orders within customer expectations.
Close coordination with R&D team to provide industry update a in order to prepare for any possible shift in customer requirements.
Prepare and map out detailed technical solution to specific needs of global network of distributors and end users.
Follow up leads and prospective customers through email or phone conversation to ensure their technical queries addressed and sales cycle is closed.

Facilitate and develop various projects to ensure optimal customer delivery across international locations.
Analyze all customer requirements and develop solutions to complex logistics challenges and provide assistance for on-time delivery of each order according to customer expectation.

profile_positions.description:
Managing the sales process from initial opportunity through securing the client purchase order and ensure successful service delivery is the main responsibility of the profession. The role involves provision of project specific proposals to the clients located in the Middle East and other assigned countries in Asia as well as frequently travelling to those regions in order to manage accounts and building relationship and trust with clients. Other important responsibilities of the role include:

•	Working closely with technical support team and project managers to provide information and ensure that customers receive excellent service.

•	Dealing with clients issues in an efficient manner informing the project manager for any problems may arise.

•	Participating in the international conferences and trade shows to build strong brand image.


•	Employ market research and industry trend analysis, market share and competitive analysis to develop a commercial strategy for a product portfolio in a given project.

profile_positions.description:
RDA Electronics is an international group with two offices in Dubai (United Arab Emirates) and Kaohsiung (Taiwan) and active in the Middle East, South Asia and North America. RDA Electronics develop and produce high-quality radio system solutions for the wireless control of cranes and machinery which are widely used in industry and logistics, construction, forestry and hydraulic applications.


Demonstrate the ability to  coordinate and manages the execution of the marketing plan of industrial electronic products for entire Middle East and South Asia. The responsibility contained  identifying opportunities for growth and improvements in customer satisfaction by creating a marketing strategy that includes segmentation, targeting, messaging, pricing, and integrated marketing programs. The knowledge of business and management principles involved in strategic planning which developed during the career considered as the key elements of the company success and profitability  

•	Success in competing with top industry-leading brands by effective analysis of key strengths and weaknesses, anticipating customer needs and satisfactions, building a network of key contacts and maintain relationship within accounts to secure customer loyalty.

•	Demonstrate ability  to identify key players in organizations and to possess the ability to convert business issues into solutions.

•	Create the launch plans for new products in the Middle East with appropriate product positioning, segment specific value propositions and distribution strategies
•	Demonstrates technical marketing skills and product knowledge necessary for success in B2B market.

•	Generate content for demand generation and awareness activities for a product portfolio in Middle East and South Asia including trade shows, customer events, advertising, telemarketing campaigns, promotions.
